description:
After releasing Sayaka, Kanami and Hiyori part ways with Rui and agree to meet with the mysterious online presence, "FineMan," in Izu. Meanwhile, back in Kamakura, Kohagura Ellen and Mashiko Kaoru are ordered by the president of Osafune Girls` School to go after Hiyori and Kanami, but where do their loyalties truly lie?
Source: crunchyroll
